column2: plot <- ggplot(data = mutated_data) + geom_jitter(aes(x = artistName, y = PopGenre, colour = PopGenre)) + labs(title = "Which artist is more interested in pop music?", x = "Artist Name", y = "Pop music popularity", caption = "Data source : Apple music playlist") + theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#E8F9FD"))
